overview: When a young woman accidentally kills her ex-lover during a fight, she decides to conceal the body. Unfortunately, however, our anti-hero is less than honorable and becomes involved with not one but both of the men she finds to help her with his disposal at a construction site. And that's just one of the problems this little case of murder and deception starts.
tagline: MEN COULDN' OWN HER! ...but they knew she would do anything to protect her secret!
title: A Degree of Murder
